statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{2 \, x^{3} - x^{2} + 4 , 5 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x + 11 , -2 \, x^{3} + x^{2} + 3 \, x - 4 , -5 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 9 , -x^{3} - 2 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
